attributes.action: Do a referendum extension for everyone not registered for previous referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Only 26% of the population of the UK voted leave,  24% voted remain what about the 50% who did not vote? Brexit adversely impacts the young who were the people who were significantly excluded. Some people were unaware of how to register. Let their voices be heard.
attributes.background:
It has been 3 years since the referendum. More young people can vote some old people have died the demographic has changed. The previous referendum was close and showed an age divide.

We should allow any one eligible now to register who was not registered last time the opportunity to vote

rejection.details:
We have received a large number of petitions about who should be allowed to vote in a second referendum. 
 
You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

16 and 17 year olds to be allowed to vote in a referendum on the Brexit deal. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234119

Have a second EU referendum and allow 15 to 17 year olds to vote as well https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234501

A 2nd Brexit referendum should allow 17 year olds on electoral registers to vote https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229971
